name: Deeper the mine
description:
Control

  • ASWD for move.
  • Left Click for mine the ore.
  • SpaceBar for attack the monster.

Adventure in the deep and dark mine with varieties of danger surrounding you. Your goal is survive in this mine as long as possible. There are ores to mine for upgrading tools and buying potion. However, if you die, everything will reset and mine will regenerate. Good luck

Program:

  •  Unity2D
  • PhotoShop
  • SFRX
  • Bosca ceoil

Asset

  • Sunny Land -  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/sunny-land-103349
